objects.text:
• A14 Bionic Chip
• 10.9" Liquid Retina Display
• 12MP Front & Back Camera
• All-Day Battery Life

product_details.name: Apple iPad (10th Generation): with A14 Bionic chip, 27.69 cm (10.9″) Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Blue
product_details.description: Country of Origin: China. Product Dimensions: 0.7 x 18 x 24.9 cm; 477 g. Importer: (If applicable) Apple India Private Limited No.24, 19th floor, Concorde Tower C, UB City, Vittal Mallya Road, Bangalore - 560 001. Item Weight: 477 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 7 x 180 x 249 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: TABLET.

banner_details:
This promotional banner presents a modern tech product layout with a split-gradient background in shades of navy blue and light blue, enhanced with soft geometric accents like semi-transparent circles and wave patterns. The top-left area contains a prominent main headline (`heading`) followed by a bold subheading (`subheading`) introducing the product generation. Below that lies a subtle blue decorative line (`decorative`) and a concise feature list in smaller white text (`description`). The price highlight (`price`) is bold and large for emphasis, appearing just above a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with clean, high-contrast text (`cta`). The right side showcases a crisp image of the product (`product_image`) extending toward the center for visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1a365d
- Sky Blue: #63b3ed
- Button Blue: #4299e1
- Light Blue Gradient: #e6f0ff to #c3dafe
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern aesthetic with a focus on vibrant, gradient-based colors. The iPad itself is wrapped in a satin light blue finish (#A3BFE3), giving it a refined and futuristic look. The screen displays overlapping ovals in expressive hues that blend smoothly to highlight contrast and depth: electric blue (#3DAFFB), magenta-pink (#F63FA5), deep violet (#3C1E76), golden yellow (#FED941), and pearly white-grey (#EDEDED). These colors blend subtly through gradient transitions yet stand out distinctly due to their vivid saturation. This dynamic palette would make for a bold, eye-catching advertisement, especially on a minimalist, dark or white background.
